mapper.insert:
insert into ceap.tb_protocol(pro_name, pro_size, pro_url, create_time, modify_time, deleted) values
(#{entity.proName}, #{entity.proSize}, #{entity.proUrl}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.deleted})

insert into ceap.tb_protocol(pro_name, pro_size, pro_url, create_time, modify_time, deleted) values
(#{entity.proName}, #{entity.proSize}, #{entity.proUrl}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.deleted})
on duplicate key update pro_name = values(pro_name) , pro_size = values(pro_size) , pro_url = values(pro_url) , create_time = values(create_time) , modify_time = values(modify_time) , deleted = values(deleted)
